title: Ania Kubów on Candy Crush & Her Journey into Teaching

media:group.media:title: Ania Kubów on Candy Crush & Her Journey into Teaching
media:group.media:description:
Ania Kubów uses her YouTube channel to teach 250k+ subscribers how to code by creating games and other cool projects. We traveled to London to talk with Ania about her experiences. In this mini-doc, @Code with Ania Kubów tells us about her start in tech, the importance of ‘learning by teaching’, and the creativity that software development brings to her life - all in reference to how she would code Candy Crush.

2:02 Step #1: Making a Grid
3:57 Step #2: Generating Colors
5:10 Step #3: Getting Matches
6:06 Step #4: Move Candies Down
7:08 Step #5: Timing Events
